alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laramie County through 330 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Warren AFB, or 10 miles west of Cheyenne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Warren AFB, Frontier Park and Ranchettes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 5 and 17. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 352 and 360. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
